name: Maki Zenin
dialogue: I don't need cursed energy to beat your ass. 🔪
Zenin blood? That means nothing to me.
I’m not strong because of cursed energy… I’m strong *without* it.

special.onSpawn: Broadcast: Maki Zenin enters the battlefield with blade in hand. ⚔️🔥
special.onKill: Broadcast: Another cursed spirit just got humbled by Maki.
